I won this in a few days. I was hoping to get more out of it. There is an online playability, but you have to play with friends who also own the game, not just anyone playing it worldwide.
It's easily the best-designed and best-playing puzzle game of all time, I just wish it had been longer.
The 2 characters you hear throughout the game, Gladys and Wheatley are PERFECT - easily the best voice-acting in a game in a long time. The design of the machines is top-notch too.
I just feel like I'm getting gypped because I can't do any of the online stuff. Those robot characters that you can see in the trailer, as well as the game cover, are the multi-player testing bots you use during that type of game. I've never been able to try them. So if anyone reading this review is eagerly looking forward to having his/her hands on the co-op campaign but is pissed off due to not having enough friends to play with (as is the case with me) :-( , do not hesitate to add me in your friend's list.

Ah, the Portal series. One of the funnest Puzzle games I've ever played. I enjoyed Portal 2 much more than the original. It has a longer storyline, and a funner experience. I especially love the Co-op added into the game. I've played it with my friends, and finished the game, along with the co-op story. I like how the puzzles get significantly more challenging within the more you play. I would recommend both games, but I think Portal 2 can be playable without needing the first game.

Великолепное продолжение первой части! Для решения каждой головоломки нужно придумать что-то новое. Сюжет одиночной игры великолепен и приправлен отличным юмором. 
    При совместном прохождении в полной мере раскрываются возможности двух портальных пушек, и четырёх порталов. Всем, кто не проходил корпоративный режим я настоятельно рекомендую найти друга и поиграть, узнаете много нового о порталах. Лично я купил брату копию в подарок за полную стоимость и полностью доволен этой покупкой. Если вам не скем пройти корпоратив - добавляйте меня в друзья (копия игры у вас должна быть своя). 
     Юмор в корпоративном прохождении не так хорош, но головоломки с лихвой компенсируют его недостаток (по сравнению с обилием юмора в одиночной игре). 
    Я всем рекомендую как Portal так и Portal 2, это две ни на что другое не похожих игры.

Gra zaskozyła mnie grafiką nawet sześć lat po produkcji. Oczywiście ważniejsze są łamigłówki, które wyniesiono na podium sztuki. Głodnym po ukończeniu kampanii singlowej bez znajomych polecam darmowy dodatek ,,Aperture Stories:Mel"

[h1]Like honestly, why wouldn't you want to play this game?[/h1]

[quote=Sheev Palpatine] do it [/quote]

You neeeed to play this Game if you haven't already. There are so many things that you need to see like for example a mind-damaging handheld Device, an evil Robot that is so ironic about itself that it gets funny, [spoiler] a dumb robot that turns evil[/spoiler], a nice Potato, an old CEO of a huge Corporation, your best Friend and many more things. And the best thing about it: [b] you don't get Fall Damage [/b] isn't that worth it?
If you're not willing to spend the full price then wait for a sale and get this game along with Portal (1) which you should also play btw.
Be warned, because you're going to wait for Portal 3 as well and I can't guarantee that you will ever see it

The Puzzle that keeps on giving and has a 2 Player Co-op Mode. Very fun for people who played Portal 1!

Theme/medium: 
First person puzzle video game. 

Objectives/Story/Rules: 
The player is thrown into the shoes of a testing subject in Aperture Science Laboratories, an old decaying seemingly endless stretch of testing tracks. The player is given a device called the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device, or, as it is more commonly known, the portal gun. With this “gun” you are able to use a unique brand of video game physics to navigate your environment, by solving challenging puzzles, all with the end result of trying to overthrow the recently awakened enemy AI. 

What I liked/disliked: 
Through the game’s roughly ten hour campaign, you, the player, are presented with many mind-bending puzzles made to teach you problem solving on many different, complex, levels. I liked this game because it made you think, and often I was stumped by the puzzles, but on every occasion there was a very well thought out equation for everything, and I can’t think of anything that I disliked about this challenging and very funny video game.

Multiplayer:
Portal 2 hosts one of the most enjoyable multiplayer games ever created. If you are playing with someone who knows what they are doing, then you will have a great time in game.

9/10

Since building my first gaming rig, I have been told that there are several "must play" games to play on PC and among those is the Portal series. No wonder it's a classic.

This game is absolutely amazing!!! Played it originally on the PS3. The story is amazing and the comedy is hilarious. Trust me, you will not be disappointed. As a side note, I did not play Portal 1 first, so it is NOT necessary to play it in chronological order(just might be a little confusing at the beginning). Take your time while playing to look around certain interesting areas. They sometimes provide clues about this mysterious future or are just easter eggs. In conclusion, I highly recommend Portal 2 for anyone interested in a captivating story with comedy and mystery along the way.

Overall: 10/10

Игра на ваше мышление со своим захватывающим сюжетом который может вас не отпустить и после прохождения игры, так же в игре присутсвует кооперотивный режим так что с друзьями ( если они у вас есть ) можете вдоём познать уже другую сюжетную компанию. В игре присутсвует и создание своей карты. Вобщем рекомендую к покупке или просто игре ( ну вы поняли о чём я )

Portal 2 is a good game.
Portal 1 is a masterpiece.
All though I prefer portal 1 that’s not to say portal 2 is bad, it just doesn’t evolve the gameplay of portal 1 much. But if you’re looking for ‘more portal’ it will likely satisfy you. The levels are improved with more mechanics and new gimmicks to make puzzles more interesting than before, the scripted set pieces are more fleshed out to make the story moments feel more visually interesting. But the writing and environmental storytelling, although still good and better than most games, it’s just not as good as portal 1. In short portal 2 is good but the standard of portal 1 was masterpiece.

Excellent !
Le concept était novateur avec Portal 1. Portal 2 en a fait un vrai jeu avec une ambiance très bien gérée, des énigmes intéressantes, un niveau de complexité correctement établi.
Des heures à y jouer.
Et les challenges, le mode coopératif amènent encore de la matière en plus du mode solo. Miam !

Portal 2 is a great game. It takes you along for a ride and it does it rather well. Well ahead of its time, it might even be the reason why so many players have faith in Valve. Valve was not defined by Counter-Strike, Valve is Half-Life and Portal. Just give us Half-Life 3 with Portal 3 at the same time, Freeman must use the Portal-gun to save humanity.

Overall an excellent puzzle game that provides an experience you are not going to forget any time soon. If you have never played Portal 1 either, get them both; you will not be disappointed.
